name: Handmade Crochet Mobile Phone Cover
description:
Grey and yellow hand crocheted mobile phone cover.

100% Merino wool
Lovely grey plastic button

Perfect for your iPhone, iPod, mobile phone, digital camera and any other item you wish to keep scratch free. Measures 7cm x 11 cm, with some stretch.

Thanks for looking!

-------

Seen something you like, but would prefer a different colour? Just ask!
